whatIsNetflixDesc: Netflix is a streaming service that offers a wide variety of award-winning TV shows, movies, anime, documentaries, and more on thousands of internet-connected devices.[break]You can watch as much as you want, whenever you want without a single commercial â€“ all for one low monthly price. There's always something new to discover and new TV shows and movies are added every week!
